original_text: And it came to pass at that time, that Judah went down from his brethren, and turned in to a certain Adullamite, whose name was Hirah.
korean_text: 그 후에 유다가 자기 형제들로부터 떠나 내려가서 아둘람 사람 히라와 가까이 하니라

sentences.original_text: And it came to pass at that time
that Judah went down from his brethren
and turned in to a certain Adullamite
